overview_of_class: This course covers time dependent quantum mechanics and its application to the interaction of radiation and matter, to scattering theory and to time-dependent spectroscopy.
name: Quantum Chemistry
title: WCAS CHEM 442-2-20 Quantum Chemistry

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course covers time dependent quantum mechanics and its application to the interaction of radiation and matter, to scattering theory and to time-dependent spectroscopy.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: 1. "Quantum Mechanics in Chemistry" by G. C. Schatz and M. A. Ratner, Dover, ISBN 0-486-42003-5

subject: CHEM
